title: Leverlin
description: Linen warp & weft with some metallic weft.  Open weave. Natural linen warp.  Natural Linen & metallic silver weft. Left Selvedge.  Stapled to 8.5x11\" card with 99.1.1206.2. \"H-4\" written on card.  Workroom weaving instructions staples to reverse. (natural, metallic silver)
